newsitem.title: RUSSIA: LUKoil says Jan output rose 3 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: LUKoil says Jan output rose 3 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Oil output at Russia's largest oil producer LUKoil was three percent higher in January than a year earlier, a senior company official said on Thursday.
"Over the first two months we have increased output," Leonid Fedun, vice-president for finance and securities, told Reuters.

Fedun said the increased production figures for January did not change the estimated total output for 1997, which remains 59.7 million tonnes, up from 58.3 million tonnes last year. He did not give precise figures for January.
